title: Ravens of Avalon: Avalon Book 3
description: Marion Zimmer Bradley’s beloved Avalon saga continues in “a fine tribute to Bradley and the real-world triumphs and tragedy of Boudica.”(Publishers Weekly)Epic in its sweep and peopled by the remarkable women who have always inhabited Avalon, Marion Zimmer Bradley’s Ravens of Avalon expands the legendary saga that has enchanted millions of readers over the years and is sure to please Bradley’s loyal readership and anyone who loves wonderfully told stories of history, myth, and fantasy.
author: Diana L. Paxson
